name: base-lol
description: Encodes/decodes binary data as a sequence of emojis.

scripts.demo: node --experimental-modules base-lol-node.mjs < targets/max-tiny.jpg > demo.base-lol; head -c 20 demo.base-lol; node --experimental-modules base-lol-node.mjs --decode < demo.base-lol > demo-decoded.jpg; diff demo-decoded.jpg targets/max-tiny.jpg
